'''1.21.80.1''' is the fifth Preview version for [[Minecraft Education 1.21.90]], released on May 7, 2025, which adds features from the [[Spring to Life|'''Spring to Life''']] drop.<ref>{{cite|url=https://edusupport.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/33201022766356-What-s-New-in-the-Beta-v1-21-80-1#:~:text=Minor%20Minecraft%20Education%20Beta/Preview%20Update%20v1.21.80.1%20%C2%B7,Minecraft%20Bedrock%20changes%20from%201.21.6x%20through%201.21|title=What's New in the Beta v1.21.80.1|website=Minecraft Education Support|date=May 8, 2025}}</ref>

== Additions ==
{{main|Bedrock Edition 1.21.60|Bedrock Edition 1.21.70|Bedrock Edition 1.21.80}}
*Added features from [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.60]] to [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.80]], '''[[Spring to Life]]'''.
**Except [[Ore UI]], new [[Superflat]] presets, and worlds pausing in the [[pause menu]].
*Re-added the "Only Allow Trusted Skins" option.

== Changes ==
;Cloud Storage System
*Now supports larger world sizes 
*Lowered error rates and better upload and download performance 
;Multiplayer and Coding
*Coding infrastructure updated for better stability and performance
*Improved performance and product stability

== Fixes ==
*Improved client stability.
*Multiplayer sign-in and connecting updated for better reliability.</onlyinclude>
